title: Guardians Of The Galaxy
description: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior...

title: Doctor Strange
description: America Chavez and a version of Stephen Strange are chased by a demon...

title: Eternals
description: A group of ancient aliens come together to protect humanity.

title: Spider-Man
description: Peter Parker, a high school student, gains spider-like abilities and fights crime.

title: Justice League
description: Batman, Wonder Woman, Aquaman, Cyborg, and The Flash team up to save the world.

title: Thor: Ragnarok
description: Thor must escape the alien planet Sakaar in time to save Asgard from Hela.
